channel.title: Admin or mod
channel.description: How do i make a person mod or admin?

item.title: Admin or mod
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Go in your client.java and search for “(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(” until you see code that looks like this "if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“hi”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

This is where you make someone a mod or admin, if you want to make someone a mod its “playerRichts=1” for admin its “playerRights=2”, and for owners its “playerRights=3”. Once you have filled in the names of whos account you are upgrading to mod/admin just save and compile. Next time its about editing something in the server make the topic in the “RS2 Server Development/Help” board

Read full topic

item.title: Admin or mod
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

If it is Testscape, that wont work. You have to mess around in the client in Testscape. Id tell you what to do if I knew, but I use Cheezscape 80.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin or mod
item.dc:creator: @Amerks5 Amerks5
item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

Go to characters, the players name, then look for player rights. It is set at 0 if you havn’t touched it.Change it to 1,2,or 3 1= mod 2=admin and 3=owner/co-owner. The exit out of that but save that, done

Read full topic
